required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 03, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Longitudinal Population-based Observational Study of Coronavirus Disease in the UK Population
clinical_study.official_title: Longitudinal Population-based Observational Study of Coronavirus Disease in the UK Population

collaborator.agency: London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine

brief_summary.textblock:
COVIDENCE is a population-based observational longitudinal study that has the following
      objectives:

        1. To determine risk factors for incident COVID-19 and for adverse outcomes of COVID-19 in
           the UK population;

        2. To characterise the natural history of COVID-19 in the UK population;

        3. To evaluate the impact of COVID-19 on the mental and economic well-being of the UK
           population; and

        4. To establish a platform for the future conduct of randomised controlled trials of
           interventions to prevent COVID-19 in the UK population.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of suspected, probable or confirmed COVID-19

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of COVID-19 requiring ventilatory support
EQ-5D-3L health-related quality of life score
Health care costs associated with incident COVID-19
Impact of COVID-19 on participants' financial status
Incidence of physical complications of COVID-19
Impact of COVID-19 on participants' mental well-being

study_pop.textblock: UK residents aged 16 years or more

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  UK resident

          -  Age ≥16 years

        Exclusion Criteria: none
